cards.name: Ameret, Hope of Night
cards.originalText:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if there are seven or more loyalty counters on Ameret, they become a 5/5 Angel creature with flying and indestructible until end of turn.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 red and white Cleric creature token with lifelink and haste.
[-X]: Ameret deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

cards.name: Amos, Rune-Mage
cards.originalText:
Whenever you scry, put a loyalty counter on Amos, Rune-Mage.
[+1]: Create a Glyph token.
[-1]: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
[-5]: Draw three cards.

cards.name: Anigul, the Setting Sun
cards.originalText:
Menace
When Anigul, the Setting Sun enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
Whenever Anigul deals combat damage to an opponent, exile up to two target cards from that player's graveyard. For each of those exiled cards, Anigul deals 1 damage to that card's owner.

cards.name: Ardent Ascetic
cards.originalText:
When Ardent Ascetic enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library an any order.
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

cards.name: Codename: Viridian
cards.originalText:
When Codename: Viridian enters the battlefield, choose first strike, haste, lifelink, reach, or trample. Create a Gadget of that type, then attach it to her.
Noncreature, non-Equipment spells cost {1} more to cast for each permanent attached to Codename: Viridian.

cards.originalText:
Whenever you cast a black spell or an artifact spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you cast a nonblack, nonartifact spell, you lose 1 life.

Flash
Prowess

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.name: Lunar Vigil
cards.originalText:
When Lunar Vigil enters the battlefield, draw a card, then scry 2.
If you would draw one or more cards, you may instead put a night counter on Lunar Vigil and draw that many cards minus one.
Sacrifice Lunar Vigil: Target player draws a card and adds {R} for each night counter on it.

cards.name: Merciless Shieldbreaker
cards.originalText: Whenever Merciless Shieldbreaker enters the battlefield or attacks, target opponent puts three rust counters on a permanent they control with no rust counters on it. That permanent gains “At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a rust counter from this permanent. Then if there are no rust counters on this permanent, sacrifice it and it deals 4 damage to you.”

Lifelink

cards.name: Smirk, Darkhand's Favored
cards.originalText:
When Smirk enters the battlefield, add the top two cards of your library to your plot. (Look at them, then exile them face-down. You may pay {7} once a turn as a sorcery to cast any number of cards in your plot without paying their mana costs.)
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.

cards.name: Symbol of the Revolution
cards.originalText:
{X}: Symbol of the Revolution dares X. (It becomes a legendary Rebel with base power and toughness X/X in addition to its other types until end of turn.)
As long as Symbol of the Revolution is a Rebel, it has flying, lifelink, first strike, and vigilance.

cards.name: Thin the Veil
cards.originalText: Search your library for a nonland card not named Thin the Veil, exile it, then shuffle. If it has mana value less than or equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you don't, put it into your hand.
